              thine
               
              image
               
              ne’er
               
              shall
               
              go
              .

speaker: FATHER
text:
My
               
              sighing
               
              breast
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              thy
               
              funeral
               
              bell
              ;

speaker: FATHER
text:
And
               
              so
               
              obsequious
               
              will
               
              thy
               
              father
               
              be

speaker: FATHER
text:
E’en
               
              for
               
              the
               
              loss
               
              of
               
              thee
              ,
               
              having
               
              no
               
              more
              ,

speaker: FATHER
text:
As
               
              Priam
               
              was
               
              for
               
              all
               
              his
               
              valiant
               
              sons
              .

speaker: FATHER
text:
I’ll
               
              bear
               
              thee
               
              hence
              ,
               
              and
               
              let
               
              them
               
              fight
               
              that
               
              will
              ,

speaker: FATHER
text:
For
               
              I
               
              have
               
              murdered
               
              where
               
              I
               
              should
               
              not
               
              kill
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Sad-hearted
               
              men
              ,
               
              much
               
              overgone
               
              with
               
              care
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Here
               
              sits
               
              a
               
              king
               
              more
               
              woeful
               
              than
               
              you
               
              are
              .

speaker:
PRINCE
               
              EDWARD
text:
Fly
              ,
               
              father
              ,
               
              fly
              ,
               
              for
               
              all
               
              your
               
              friends
               
              are
               
              fled
              ,

speaker:
PRINCE
               
              EDWARD
text:
And
               
              Warwick
               
              rages
               
              like
               
              a
               
              chafèd
               
              bull
              .

speaker:
PRINCE
               
              EDWARD
text:
Away
              ,
               
              for
               
              Death
               
              doth
               
              hold
               
              us
               
              in
               
              pursuit
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Mount
               
              you
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              ;
               
              towards
               
              Berwick
               
              post
               
              amain
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Edward
               
              and
               
              Richard
              ,
               
              like
               
              a
               
              brace
               
              of
               
              greyhounds

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Having
               
              the
               
              fearful
               
              flying
               
              hare
               
              in
               
              sight
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
With
               
              fiery
               
              eyes
               
              sparkling
               
              for
               
              very
               
              wrath

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
And
               
              bloody
               
              steel
               
              grasped
               
              in
               
              their
               
              ireful
               
              hands
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Are
               
              at
               
              our
               
              backs
              ,
               
              and
               
              therefore
               
              hence
               
              amain
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
Away
              ,
               
              for
               
              Vengeance
               
              comes
               
              along
               
              with
               
              them
              .

speaker: EXETER
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              stay
               
              not
               
              to
               
              expostulate
              ,
               
              make
               
              speed
              ;

speaker: EXETER
text:
Or
               
              else
               
              come
               
              after
              ;
               
              I’ll
               
              away
               
              before
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              take
               
              me
               
              with
               
              thee
              ,
               
              good
               
              sweet
               
              Exeter
              ;

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Not
               
              that
               
              I
               
              fear
               
              to
               
              stay
              ,
               
              but
               
              love
               
              to
               
              go

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Whither
               
              the
               
              Queen
               
              intends
              .
               
              Forward
              ,
               
              away
              !
